cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on January 19, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4404, Kissimmee River Wild and Scenic River Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 120 (Friday, July 9, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SOTO:
H.R. 4404.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, of the U.S. Consitution.
[Page H3618]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

title: Kissimmee River Wild and Scenic River Act
